channel.title: Server status page, possible inaccuracy?
channel.description: I have viewed the server status page I set up for my Ip address (68.49.136.7) and I see it's only registering 82% up-time when I've listed it last night and it's been running all night. It says It's online now, so I'm wondering If the server was unable to make a ping request or If I didn't respond to the ping request in the proper way. I can assure you though, I run this server twenty-four hours a day seven days a week.

item.title: Server status page, possible inaccuracy?
item.dc:creator: @andrew4444 andrew4444
item.description:
@andrew4444 wrote:

[quote=“The Chubby Bunny, post:4, topic:329545”][quote author=sjoukjeowns link=topic=425927.msg3128694#msg3128694 date=1266251299]
Alot of restarts perhaps?
[/quote]
yu ned moar gramar[/quote]
Likewise.

Anyways, on topic, are there any ideas why this may be occurring.

Read full topic

restarts are hourly, but happens at a random time within the hour. It restarts at 22 minutes past the hour.
